name: Algorithms: Divide and Conquer, Sorting and Searching, and Randomized Algorithms

description: The primary topics are: greedy algorithms and dynamic programming.

name: Algorithms: Shortest Paths Revisited, NP-Complete Problems and What To Do About Them
description: The primary topics are: shortest paths, NP-completeness and what it means for the algorithm designer, and strategies for coping with computationally intractable problems.
